questions:
What is the photo about?
A) A carved letter on wood
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A carved piece of wood

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A person
B) An animal
C) A tree
D) Carved initials on a wooden surface

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A flower
B) A carved letter on wood
C) A bird
D) A lake

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) More wooden surfaces
C) A city skyline
D) A river

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Grass
B) Sand
C) Carved wooden surface
D) Water

A) Polished wood
B) Painted wood
C) Weathered wood
D) Freshly cut wood

A) It is new and polished
B) It is old and weathered
C) It is freshly painted
D) It is covered in moss

A) An artist's signature
B) A natural phenomenon
C) A random pattern

B) Rough and splintered

D) Reddish

A) Smooth and polished
